Name: Agent1218
About the game: Agent1218 Is a Virtual Reality sci fi shooter, Some mechanics include Picking up up Objects, Weapons, Devices and Artifacts. you can Shoot Down or throw grenades at Enemies. Heal yourself with Health Syringes, Jump and smooth walk around to Explore Through the dark Ancient Alien Temple. Your start as Agent1218 a detective from Nira City one of the last cities still remaining after the frost covered the world after finding out information on a location about and ancient alien artifact agent1218 sets of in his vehicle there he arrives at a compound with an elevator going underground once agnet1218 is underground he notices that this place must be an ancient alien temple of some kind and after exploring he comes across many bugs that want to infect him and Viraks Company guards that wont to shoot him and finally after Agent1218 makes his way through the Temple he finds the Artifacts chambers and tries to retrieve it but instead is shot down by CEO of the Viraks Company to soon take the Artifact from you.
